price: Kila khabari ina kipindi chake. Nanyi mtakuja jua.
footnotes: Kila khabari iliyo letwa na Qur'ani ina wakati wake wa kutimia. Nanyi mtakuja jua ukweli wa khabari hizi zitapo tokea.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
